name: Cashus Clay
description: Cashus Clay, also called Cash Kush, is a clone-only strain from THClones. This flavorful cross is a triumvirate of potent genetics, including True OG, Bubble Gum, and Master Kush. This trio combines rich berry terpenes and pleasurable body effects against a powerful mind expanding euphoria. Even with this strain’s deep indica lineage, the breeder swears by its focused, motivating qualities thus classifying it as a hybrid. Utilize Cashus Clay throughout the day, but mind your dosage. This potent strain can be potentially sedative for the inexperienced consumer.
attributes_title: Energetic, Focused, Aroused, Uplifted, Creative, Stress, Depression, Fatigue, Insomnia, Pain, Dry Eyes, Dizzy, Dry Mouth
